entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.9°C

Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
